name: GenAIAdvancedPRReviewer
description: Advanced Pull Request reviewer using Azure OpenAI and LangGraph React agent for precise, intelligent code reviews
author: Advanced PR Reviewer Team

inputs.name: mcp_servers
inputs.label: MCP Servers Configuration
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Optional JSON array describing Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers that should enrich each review. Example: 
[{"name":"knowledge-base","endpoint":"https://example.com/mcp","headers":{"Authorization":"Bearer $(MCP_TOKEN)"}}]

inputs.name: azure_openai_api_version
inputs.label: Azure OpenAI API Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: API version to use when calling Azure OpenAI (e.g., 2025-04-01-preview for GPT-5)

inputs.name: azure_openai_use_responses_api
inputs.label: Use Responses API
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable this option for models that require the Responses API (e.g., GPT-4.1, GPT-5).

inputs.name: azure_openai_api_key
inputs.label: Azure OpenAI API Key
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure OpenAI API key for authentication

inputs.name: azure_openai_deployment_name
inputs.label: Azure OpenAI Deployment Name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the Azure OpenAI model deployment to use

inputs.name: max_llm_calls
inputs.label: Maximum LLM Calls
inputs.helpMarkDown: Maximum number of LLM calls allowed during review (default: 100)

inputs.name: review_threshold
inputs.label: Review Threshold
inputs.helpMarkDown: Confidence threshold for suggesting changes (0.0-1.0, default: 0.7)

inputs.name: enable_code_suggestions
inputs.label: Enable Code Suggestions
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable AI-powered code suggestions and improvements

inputs.name: enable_security_scanning
inputs.label: Enable Security Scanning
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enable security vulnerability scanning in code review

inputs.name: support_self_signed_certificate
inputs.label: Support Self-Signed Certificate
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select this option to support self-signed certificates
